response.job_title: Mechanical engineer INSA Rouen, France. Mechanical engineer National University of Colombia.
response.summary: I am a mechanical engineer at INSA Rouen (National Institute of Applied Sciences) and from the National University of Colombia. I am looking for an opportunity as a design/simulation mechanical engineer.
response.skills: Engineering Documentation, Avantages sociaux, Active Listening, Stress Analysis, MSC Patran, Product Design, Mechanical Product Design, Design for Manufacturing, Technical Drawing, Engineering Design, Manufacturing, Geometric Dimensioning & Tolerancing, Siemens NX, Deliverables, Communication, Decision-Making, Bilingual Communications, Matlab, ANSYS, Autodesk Inventor

profile_positions.description:
Development of datasheets, technical specifications, and requisitions for static and rotating equipment in the hydrocarbon industry or process plants.
Specification and selection of rotating and static mechanical equipment for conceptual and basic engineering phases.
Estimation and review of quantities of work according to the specialty, based on design documents, for budgetary purposes.
Communication with internal and external clients in English and Spanish to present and resolve technical uncertainties.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Inside Sales/Application Engineer for fluid control and regulation equipment (control valves, regulators, emergency valves, etc.).

    Sizing teams according to customer needs.
    Developing technical and commercial proposals.
    Managing technical meetings for local and international clients, both internal and external.
profile_positions.title: Inside sales engineer

profile_positions.description: Draftsman in a project for the expansion and automation of a coal coke production plant. Designing and assembling the various ideas and systems from different engineering groups within the project using Solidworks software, as well as being responsible for the necessary fabrication and assembly drawings for specific systems.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical designer

profile_positions.description: Mechanical engineer in charge of finite element analysis of short circuit in distribution boards
profile_positions.title: Mechanical engineer

profile_positions.description: Teacher of basic French and English, for the levels A1 y A2 in Bridge Academia de Idiomas.
profile_positions.title: Basic level French and English teacher.

profile_positions.description: Home tutor from different areas of knowledge (mathematics, English, Physics, etc.) in Lehrer Profesores Personalizados.
profile_positions.title: Home tutor

profile_positions.description:
Mechanical calculation engineer within the unit Operational Unit Components Gas Seals

Development of Hydraulic Bearings for Centrifugal Compressors

Nonlinear FEA calculation ANSYS Workbench
Excel and Mathcad analytical calculation
Rotordynamic calculation (frequency analysis)
Adjustment of the CAD model NX_UNIX
Realization of industrialization plan and budget
profile_positions.title: Engineer intership

profile_positions.description:
Work within the department of design office in the design of machines and machining tools:

Assembly of parts for engine blocks
Transfer robot island arrangement for machining and marking the suspension arms of cars.
Management of orders of parts and elements.
3D design of frames from 2D plans
profile_positions.title: Engineer intership

profile_positions.description: • Engineer's assistant in a project to design a mechanism to hoist flags without electricity; digital model under CAD Inventor software
profile_positions.title: Engineer's assistant

school.name: Institut national des Sciences appliquées de Rouen

company.name: Kent
company.description:
We design, build and maintain the assets that power the world for today and make it future-ready for tomorrow. ​​

From consulting to design, build, commissioning and start-up through to maintenance and decommissioning.  It is our ambition to become the global leader in integrated energy services. ​

We’re more than prepared to meet the challenges of our industry today. We’re also future-ready – for new and innovative energy solutions in more locations, and across more disciplines than ever before. ​

We’re large enough to offer every skill and capability.  Small enough to be agile and make decisions on the ground, right where they’re needed. ​​

That helps us put our clients at the top of their game. And puts us at the top of ours.

location.address: Office 2501, Swiss Tower, JLT Cluster Y
